name: Space Sergeant Survivors
description:
Space Sergeant Survivors is an action roguelite where the player shoots hordes of hostile robots and unlock useful powerups along the way. Survive against en
dles waves of enemy swarms until time runs out!

A casual fun take on the popular "Survivors" rougelite sub-genre.

  • move the character to dodge enemy attacks while the character automatically attack enemies
  • consists of 6 stages with 10-15 minute runs
  • choose from 16 unique powerups upon leveling up
  • has cute 3d cartoon graphics
